text: Conserve (Dutch: "Uitgeverij Conserve") was a Dutch publishing organization that was founded in 1983 in Schoorl by Kees de Bakker. The company was specialised in publishing historical novels. Cynthia McLeod was one of the authors published by Conserve. On 1 January 2019 Conserve merged into Singel Uitgeverijen. ==Works== * Lord of Formosa ==External links== * Conserve Category:Book publishing companies of the Netherlands Category:Defunct publishing companies of the Netherlands
title: Conserve (publisher)
